/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. The buildings are adorned with colorful murals, adding a vibrant touch to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a beautiful backdrop to the scene. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the textures of the buildings and trees.
